text: Steve Hamilton (1935–1997) was an American professional baseball and basketball player. Steve Hamilton may also refer to: *Steve Hamilton (author) (born 1961), American detective novel writer *Steve Hamilton (American football) (born 1961), American defensive end for the Washington Redskins *Steve Hamilton (broadcaster) (1950-2009), Scottish broadcaster who voiced the UK version of Wheel of Fortune
title: Steve Hamilton (disambiguation)
